text: The 2009 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards were held on July 23, 2009, at the Tennis Indoor Senayan in Tanah Abang, Central Jakarta and hosted by Raffi Ahmad, Indra Bekti, and Fitri Tropica. 2009 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards get 30.000 votes retrieved on 2009-07-24 The ceremony awards held the theme for "Playground Adventure". Agnes Monica and Raffi Ahmad led the nominations with three categories, followed by Afgan, Bunga Citra Lestari, and Luna Maya with two nominations. Afgan was the biggest winner of the night, taking home two awards in the categories: Favorite Male Singer and Indonesian Star Wannabe Award. ==Winners and nominees== Winners are listed in bold. title: 2009 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards
